patch 8.1.2164: stuck when using "j" in a popupwin with popup_filter_menu

Problem:    Stuck when using "j" in a popupwin with popup_filter_menu if a
            line wraps.
Solution:   Check the cursor line is visible. (closes #4577)

attachments.text:
